goal: Build a high-fidelity support AI assistant for the current product with grounded answers, safe fallback behavior, and measurable quality gates.
constraints: Keep existing architecture unless a change is required by acceptance criteria.
Do not break existing user-facing routes and APIs.
Prefer incremental migrations instead of large rewrites.
acceptance_criteria: Assistant answers must be grounded in explicit sources and show fallback when uncertain.
Critical user flows must stay functional.
Automated checks must pass after each implementation slice.
planner_notes: Prioritize system reliability and testability before adding UI polish.
implementer_notes: Keep code changes readable. Include minimal comments only where logic is non-obvious.
reviewer_notes: Block slices with obvious regressions, missing tests, or vague acceptance coverage.
